body_html: @trias702 The place is at here and the file is finally written at Line 276 of that file, which is supposed to be placed at torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen. The python scripts will be executed under torch\lib\build\ATen and using the write functions here will put the files in the right location.
body_text: @trias702 The place is at here and the file is finally written at Line 276 of that file, which is supposed to be placed at torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen. The python scripts will be executed under  torch\lib\build\ATen and using the write functions here will put the files in the right location.
body: @trias702 The place is at [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/445cc1f5b9a1647949c7b27b60e9800339f88db9#diff-76aa8cb3d0fad99c5f761d08cbcb4d19R60) and the file is finally written at Line 276 of that file, which is supposed to be placed at `torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen`. The python scripts will be executed under  `torch\lib\build\ATen` and using the write functions [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/445cc1f5b9a1647949c7b27b60e9800339f88db9#diff-76aa8cb3d0fad99c5f761d08cbcb4d19L107) will put the files in the right location.
